channel.title: change me on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in change me on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: French Onion Soup
item.description: Makes: Enough for 4 Takes: 3 hours Bakes: No time at all Ingredients 1 kg brown onions (unpeeled weight) 40g butter 1 tablespoon olive oil 2 tablespoons plain flour 100ml Sherry 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar 800ml beef stock 4-8 slices of French stick 150g gruyere Peel, top and tail the onions and cut into slivers. Melt the butter with the oil in a large heavy-bottomed pan. Put the onions in the pan, and stir so that everything gets a good coating of the butter.

item.title: Brown Scones
item.description: Ingredients 6ozs plain flour 6ozs brown flour Handful of pinhead oatmeal and bran 4ozs margarine 1 teaspoon bread soda Buttermilk Method Roll it out as wet as possible. Bake at 200Â°f for about 20 minutes:
